name: Simplest FPS
description:
Found this great little tutorial from Ajesh Nair on YouTube. 

Assets used: 

  • Meshtint - CUBE Sci Fi Interiors
  • Polygon Aliens
  • Low Poly FPS Sample (free)

Controls

  • Aim - Mouse
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • WASD - Move
  • R - Reload
  • Escape - Quit Game

Lots to do

  • Player HUD
  • Player Health
  • Sounds
  • Main Menu
  • Sci Gun looking gun
